import React from "react"; import { Col, Row, Form, FormGroup, Label, Button, ModalBody, ModalFooter } from "reactstrap"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { addContact } from "../../redux/actions/contacts"; const mapStateToProps = state => ({ id: state.contactApp.contacts.length }); const AddContact = ({ id, dispatch }) => { let firstname, lastname, department, company, phone, email, address, notes; return (
{ e.preventDefault(); if (!firstname.value.trim() || !phone.value.trim() || !email.value.trim()) { return; } dispatch( addContact( id, firstname.value, lastname.value, company.value, department.value, email.value, phone.value, address.value, notes.value ) ); firstname.value = ""; lastname.value = ""; company.value = ""; department.value = ""; email.value = ""; phone.value = ""; address.value = ""; notes.value = ""; }} > (firstname = node)} required /> (lastname = node)} /> (department = node)} /> (company = node)} /> (phone = node)} required /> (email = node)} required /> (address = node)} /> (notes = node)} />
); }; export default connect(mapStateToProps)(AddContact);
